title: Conservation is a conservative cause – we cannot leave environmentalism to the Left
text:
Polls overwhelmingly show that millennials consider climate change our number one problem. More than any other generation in history, today’s young people believe that large-scale solutions to our environmental crisis are not only necessary, but existentially urgent.

At the same time, there is a very powerful narrative making the political rounds. A rather worrying trend has developed, in which the so-called progressive Left has all but monopolised the debate on environmental issues.

It’s hammered down upon us that only those on the Left can care about climate change, that anyone right-of-centre is by default a shameless capitalist indifferent to the environment. This is dangerous rhetoric....
